FROM centos:7
RUN echo $'[nginx] \n\ name=nginx repo \n\ baseurl=http://nginx.org/packages/centos/$releasever/$basearch/ \n\ gpgcheck=0 \n\ enabled=1' >> /etc/yum.repos.d/nginx.repo \ && yum update \ && yum install -y nginx
ADD nginx.conf /etc/nginx/nginx.conf #ADD sites-enabled/ /etc/nginx/sites-enabled
# forward request and error logs to docker log collector RUN ln -sf /dev/stdout /var/log/nginx/access.log \ && ln -sf /dev/stderr /var/log/nginx/error.log
ADD app/ /app
EXPOSE 80 443
CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]
